properties.Name: MarketingEventType
properties.Description:
A categorization of Marketing Events based on common characteristics, objectives or functions.

Ex:
PROSPECT CUSTOMER MARKETING

LEARNING EVENT (Internal or External - Seminar or Public Education)
A seminar, training course, human enhancement event or similar event that may be characterized by the business organization as being for 'training', 'learning' or 'improvement' of internal staff, customers, the public or some other readily identifiable segment of interest to the business organization.

Seminar - Meeting or series meetings of specialists who have different skills but have specific common interest and have together for training or learning purposes.

Public Education - A learning event intended to educate the public regarding something of importance to the business or a product/service.

PUBLIC RELATIONS EVENT
A marketing event that generates goodwill toward an individual, cause, company, or product.

COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT EVENT
A marketing event that involves benefits to the community.

SALES CALL

ADVERTISING EVENT
A specific execution, performance or placement of a single Advertising Collateral.

CONTEST EVENT
A promotion whereby consumers compete for prizes or money on the basis of skills or ability, and winners are determined by judging the entries or ascertaining which entry comes closest to some predetermined criteria. Sales contests can stimulate business over a short period or focus attention on a particular product. The primary aim of a sales contest is to motivate the sales staff to concentrate their efforts over a short period of time or focus on a specific product.

MARKET RESEARCH EVENT
The process of gathering, analyzing and interpreting information about a market; about a product or service to be offered for sale in that market; and about the past, present and potential customers for the product or service.

Columns.Name: MarketingEventTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Marketing Event Type.

Columns.Name: MarketingEventTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Marketing Event Type.

Columns.Name: MarketingEventTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Marketing Event Type.
